message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $175 for it, which is a great price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand you're interested in the product but $120 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $140, which is still a good deal for both of us. What do you say?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still not able to meet at $140, but I am willing to go up to $130 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
